about_the_game:
Reclaim Your Corrupted Memories

Dive into a captivating world where fragmented memories await discovery! In this side-scroller adventure, navigate the remains of a once thriving civilization and piece together your scattered past. Between classical jump-n-run and puzzle solving, you have to keep a close eye on your surroundings. Explore the depths as you uncover forgotten stories and concealed corruption. On your journey, you must face the truth about your past life while reclaiming the essence of yourself.

You Are Not Alone

Make your way through this hostile world and challenge yourself with uncovering it's secrets. Along the way you'll meet enigmatic strangers - use their powers to navigate the environment on different ways. Learn how to walk through solid steel bars or see in the dark. Can they aid you on your journey? Remember, every light casts a shadow.

Mesmerizing Music

Immerse yourself in this dystopian adventure with a live-recorded orchestral soundtrack that brings every moment to life. Feel the intensity and emotion as the music adapts to your journey, making each scene unforgettable.

Key Features

  • Story-Driven Gameplay

  • Jump-n-Run

  • Spezial Abilities like Teleportation to overcome obstacles

  • Variety of different Puzzles

  • Interact with the World to make your way

  • Enjoy the live-recorded Orchestral Soundtrack adapting to your Gameplay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In a world of corrupted memories, you traverse the remains of a once flourishing city. Shadows flicker around you and metallic echoes pulse through your mind. Search for your father's legacy to regain your forgotten past. But beware! Each step takes you deeper into a waking nightmare.
